subject: AI & Agents
title: GDPR, CCPA, and AI Compliance
description: Learn GDPR, CCPA, and AI Compliance in one minute.

hook.text: A user asks 'delete my data from your model.' Can you comply?

buildup.text: GDPR's right to erasure and CCPA's deletion rights apply to AI systems too.

discovery.text: Deleting data from training sets is possible. Deleting it from model weights is notâ€”yet.

twist.text: Machine unlearning is an active research area but has no production-ready solution.

climax.text: Document data lineage, implement consent flows, and design for deletion from the start.

quiz.question: Why is right-to-erasure hard with trained models?
options: Data is embedded in model weights and can't be simply deleted
The model can be retrained instantly
